author: Guest (Guest)
title: NetBeans 7.1
text: Will this plugin get NetBeans 7.1 support? I'd love to try Fantom with full IDE support, but I'd rather not downgrade to NetBeans 7.0. With NetBeans 7.1, I was able to successfully install, but the source parsing/highlighting is clearly not working.
